title: [1.5.2][SSP/SMP/LAN] Familiars API
author: ywt1993
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ywt1993 于 2013-5-4 16:11 编辑 

貌似是一种新的基于forge 的API


原文
How to install:
Put the zip-file into the mods-folder (gets generated by modloader/forge).


If you want to create your own Familiar, take a look: http://www.minecraft.../#entry14723174

The Familiar mod that includes a little familiar for the player, so it's not always so lonely in SSP.

A Familiar is a kind of protector / companion that always follows the player.
They are not tameable like dogs and do not occur in the wild. These can be equipped like items / armor, Dungeon Defenders has inspired me.

The creatures do not only fly someone behind they also have a passive/active skill (attack by mobs, heal the player etc).


Some are not available from the beginning, you need to unlock them first (buy with XP or unlock achievements).


This mod is an API too (tut comes soon), so anyone might make a complete MLP Familiar Pack or Pokemon or something ^^


To equip them you have to use the FamGuide, you'll find there further info and how to unlock them.



To craft it, you'll need a book, gunpowder, spidereye, bones and rotten flesh.




DefaultMobs FamPack for Familiars API.jpg (21.8 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2013-5-4 15:38 上传






大体意思呢。。。就是可以基于这个API制作怪物图鉴一样的东西
主要用于单人（ssp）
可以制作出一个怪物伙伴。。并且不像狗那样。。也不会出现在自然中
可以给他们装备护甲或者物品
灵感来源于Dungeon Defenders
这些伙伴生物不仅可以跟随玩家（飞行）也有一些被动或者主动技能（比如攻击生物，或者治疗玩家）
一些生物一开始不能被玩家所召唤（可以使用经验值或者成就购买/解锁新生物）
这个mod也是一个API，因此所有人可以通过它制作自己图鉴
要装备伙伴你需要一个FamGuide（合成方法上面的图）


注：这个API 有FamPack
FamPack就是这个mod的附属mod
你想运行这个mod至少需要一个FamPack
可以去
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1205545-create-your-own-familiar-for-familiars-api/#entry14723174
